title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, March 11, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of author and illustrator Ezra Jack Keats (1916). Unlike most children’s authors at the time, he celebrated city life. His first book was “The Snowy Day” (1962).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
